posts.title: Getting Started with PlayPI: Your Local API Testing Playground
posts.excerpt: Learn API automation testing with PlayPI - a free, Docker-based tool that gives you instant access to RESTful, GraphQL, gRPC, and WebSocket APIs running entirely on your local machine. No internet required, no API keys needed, and no rate limits!
posts.author: Syam Sasi

posts.title: How to Write a Great Abstract for Your TAQELAH Lightning Talk
posts.excerpt: A strong abstract is the most important part of your TAQELAH Lightning Talk proposal. Learn how to craft a compelling abstract that aligns with the 2026 theme: 'Test Beyond Tomorrow: Skills, Tools & Mindsets for the Next Decade of QA'.
posts.author: Syam Sasi

posts.title: Prompt Evaluator Setup Guide - Complete Installation Tutorial
posts.excerpt: Learn how to set up Prompt Evaluator from scratch, from installing Node.js to running your first AI model comparison. This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to systematically compare AI models like GPT-4 and Gemini.
posts.author: Syam Sasi
